headerDisplay:
This is a plugin that integrates your Pioneer AVR as a TV accessory in HomeKit. If a configuration for the legacy plugin `pioneerAvrAccessory` is found in the `homebridge` `config.json`, this will be used with priority. If the legacy configuration is not present, the plugin will then check its own configuration settings. Only if neither configuration is defined will the plugin proceed to automatically scan the network for your receiver, ensuring reliable detection and integration even in environments with dynamic IP addresses. 

To use the network scan, ensure that `pioneerAvrAccessory` is removed from `config.json`, and leave `ip` field empty in the plugin configuration.

If the old plugin `pioneerAvrAccessory` was previously installed and your configuration is still listed under `accessory` instead of `platforms`, please update your `config.json` by removing any outdated configurations under `accessory` to ensure the plugin functions correctly.

> Note: This plugin is specifically designed for Pioneer models using the telnet PRONTO protocol (e.g., VSX-922)
